column3: The last commits ensures we can easily handle an extended networking page (with additional QValidatedLineEdit fields) in `eventFilter()` without duplicating much UI element code.\n
@laanwj I would like to merge that last commit after you took a look.\n

Yeah, that's good.

Edit: Updated with the last rebase!

I simply split the if(case 1 && case 2) into 2 if(case 1) { if(case 2) } as this is likely needed, when adding more proxy options. I remember you learned me to split a pull like this off from a new feature pull :).\n
You can factor it out of the IF/ELSE statement too :)\n

I had that in mind too, don't ask me why I didn't do it. Perhaps I like rebasing so much :D.

Edit: Take a look at the code, I guess this is now even better!
Lol I guess you could move this to a signal handler for proxyIpValid now, instead of here (though I think this is fine, it's your choice).\n
I will create an additional commit for this, take a look and then we decide if we leave this as is or use the version after the commit.\n
Customizing this message causes extra work for the translators. I think it's better to keep this message generic, so that we can re-use it for all settings that need restarting. \n
